attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British producers should be given more help to enable them to feed their local communities so that Great Britain can become self-sufficient once more! 
Farmers should be encouraged to Trade more Locally for the benefit of all but they need assistance in plannning how to do this effectively and more avenues are required to aid with the distribution of their produce. Government intervention is required to do this effectively.
